inclusion.criterion: cirrhosis and portal hypertension older than 18 old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: CT scan or MRI in the last 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: capable of receiving and understanding information relating to the study and giving his written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: affiliated to the French social security system
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: cirrhotic patient with overt HE or history of persistent or recurrent HE
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous transjugular intrahepatic portosystemic shunt (TIPS) or surgical shunt
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of neurological or psychiatric disorder
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with treatment by benzodiazepines or opioid substitution
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient under guardianship, trusteeship or the protection of justice or incapable of giving their own informed consent
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 55-year-old man with mild Parkinson's disease. He has hypertension and hypercholesterolemia but no signs of dementia.
